mapper.select: SELECT nseq, subject, content, id as sid, indate, admin_id FROM notice ORDER BY indate DESC
SELECT nseq, subject, content, id as sid, indate, admin_id FROM notice WHERE id LIKE '%'||#{sid}||'%' AND subject LIKE '%'||#{subject}||'%' ORDER BY nseq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET subject=#{subject} , content=#{content} WHERE nseq=#{nseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nseq, subject, content, id) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{sid})
